column4: Does anyone one know why a USB hub wouldn't work and what you could do to fix it?
is it externally powered or powered through the usb port? and what have you tried plugging into it?
I have tried plugging it into one of the two USB ports on my laptop
I am trying to plug a mouse into it
is it externally powered? or powered through usb?
dmesg sees "new full speed USB device using uhci_hcd and address ...:
can you please answer my question?
it is externally powered
I guess - I don't think the usb hub is externally powered, just the fans that are in it
it works fine under windows
have you tried plugging anything else into it?
dmesg sees it "USB hub found; 4 ports detected"
have you tried plugging anything else into it?
the mouse works when I plug it directly into the other USB port on the laptop
but not when I plug it into usb
yes I have tried to plug a hd into it also, and another wireless mouse
yeah - anything I plug into the usb hub doesn't seem to work
dmesg can't see anything when I plug devices into the hub
I'm not sure then. sounds funky. my usb hub works..so i don't know.
this usb hub used to work well
quit working like two days ago
I will post to forum, just wanted to make sure I wasn't doing something stupid
you said it was working fine and now it's not? sounds like a faulty device then
